originalText.text: I  am an attorney practicing law for over 30 years.  When I need representation for myself or my family, I call Dewey Golkin.  He is the best attorney to handle any type of civil litigation.  He is knowledgeable, friendly and effective in his representation.  He keeps his clients informed throughout the proceedings.  I highly recommend using his services.

text.text: I  am an attorney practicing law for over 30 years.  When I need representation for myself or my family, I call Dewey Golkin.  He is the best attorney to handle any type of civil litigation.  He is knowledgeable, friendly and effective in his representation.  He keeps his clients informed throughout the proceedings.  I highly recommend using his services.

originalText.text: Mr. Golkin has been representing me and my family's concerns for over twenty years!  I have personally benefited from his heartfelt interest to protect his client.  He is extremely qualified and experienced as an attorney and as a CPA.   Dewey Golkin is a winning attorney!

text.text: Mr. Golkin has been representing me and my family's concerns for over twenty years!  I have personally benefited from his heartfelt interest to protect his client.  He is extremely qualified and experienced as an attorney and as a CPA.   Dewey Golkin is a winning attorney!

originalText.text: I have known this person professionally and used his services for ten years and have obviously been satisfied.  He is quite thorough in his analysis and always shows me courtesy and concern.   His advice has always been to the point and has served me well.

text.text: I have known this person professionally and used his services for ten years and have obviously been satisfied.  He is quite thorough in his analysis and always shows me courtesy and concern.   His advice has always been to the point and has served me well.

originalText.text: This guy may just be the most rude, arrogant, unprofessional hearing officer in the City of New York. He simply cannot carry a conversation in a respectful manner. He is not a good listener and interrupts every few seconds which dismisses the points one makes in a case. He judges you as a person by appearance as opposed to the case in hand based on the conversation. Please avoid!
